publishedfiledetails.title: Auto Cook
publishedfiledetails.description:
So you are here ?
Ah.. you're bored of spending your life preparing your next meal.
You've come to the right place.


[h1]How to initiate the food preparation ?[/h1]
[list]
[*]You need an empty Bowl, Frying Pan or Griddle Pan.
[*]You need accessible food.
[*]See your Character Info Panel 'Cook' tab for more options.
[*]Right click on the Bowl / Pan in your inventory and left click on "Auto Cook XXX"
[/list]


[h1]FAQ[/h1]
[list]
[*]Option to open canned / jarred food is broken and deactivated until I find a way in B42.
[*]Works on all evolved recipes, only on evolved recipes, not on simple recipes.
[*]Requires empty container (There is an option to complete existing meals but I advise against it).
[*]Can be added / remove any save any time.
[*]Works for B42 and further versions.
[*]Use [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2640569820]this other mod for B41[/url] and previous versions.
[*]If you still have questions, ask on [url=https://discord.gg/theindiestone]Official PZ Discord: mod_support channel[/url].
[/list]


[h1]Credits[/h1]
[list]
[*]Community propositions implemented by [url=https://steamcommunity.com/profiles/76561197963717804/myworkshopfiles/]MassCraxx[/url].
[/list]


[quote]
[url=http://theindiestone.com/forums/index.php/topic/2530-mod-permissions/?p=36479]On Lockdown[/url]
This mod cannot be modified by anyone else, for anything else, at all, ever. Even if the user disappears, he or she would much rather you didn't touch the fruits of their hard labour.
[/quote]

If you wanna support, kind words are very welcome.
If you don't have any, you can still give constructive criticism.

Workshop ID: 3388721641
Mod ID: AutoCook
